summary: File CSV file is used for importing and exporting file metadata. The CSV file can be used to create new files or update existing ones within directories.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the file in Markdown format.

headers.name: directory
headers.description: Fully qualified name of the parent directory.

headers.name: fileType
headers.description: Type of file based on content (Document, Image, Video, Audio, Archive, Code, Data, Other).

headers.name: owners
headers.description: Owners of the file. Multiple owners are separated by ';'. Each owner is specified as 'type:name' format.

headers.name: tags
headers.description: Fully qualified classification tag names associated with the file separated by ';'.

headers.name: glossaryTerms
headers.description: Fully qualified glossary term names associated with the file separated by ';'.

headers.name: domains
headers.description: Fully qualified names of the domains the file belongs to, separated by ';'.

headers.name: dataProducts
headers.description: List of fully qualified names of data products this file is part of, separated by ';'.

headers.name: experts
headers.description: Subject matter experts for this file. Multiple experts are separated by ';'.

headers.name: reviewers
headers.description: Reviewers for this file. Multiple reviewers are separated by ';'.
